answers.answer: How did the doctor's appointment go? How is your Dad feeling now?

My mother passed away July 19, 2009 of Congestive Heart Failure & Diabetes.* Diet, especially balancing or keeping a healty diet and weight.* How much fluid should he be drinking and what to avoid.* What usually happens with people with CH?, How long do they usually live afterdiagnose? I believe it is 5 yrs, but some people have lived well into 80's* What will be the medicine side effects.Judy

question: I have just become p.o.a for my 75yr old father. this afternoon we have a appointment with a new primary doctor I have picked for him. MY question is , what should be on my list of questions for the doctor about my fathers symtoms
title: what questions should i ask my fathers new primary doctor about his congestive heart failure and diabetes
